inspirationalQuote.text: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
inspirationalQuote.author: William Osler

paretoBanner.title: The Pareto Principle in Medicine
paretoBanner.description: Focus on the 20% of topics that appear in 80% of exams. Master high-yield concepts to maximize your scores.

questionOfTheDay.question: A 55-year-old male presents with sudden-onset chest pain. An ECG reveals ST-segment elevation in leads II, III, and aVF. Which coronary artery is most likely occluded?

subjects.name: Physiology
subjects.description: The study of how the human body works. Explore the functions of organ systems, from cellular processes to the whole organism.

textbooks.title: Guyton and Hall Textbook of Medical Physiology
textbooks.author: 14th Edition

subjects.name: Biochemistry
subjects.description: The study of chemical processes within and relating to living organisms. Understand the molecular basis of life.

subjects.name: Pathology
subjects.description: The study of the causes and effects of disease or injury. Bridge the gap between basic science and clinical practice.

textbooks.title: Robbins & Cotran Pathologic Basis of Disease
textbooks.author: 10th Edition

subjects.name: Microbiology
subjects.description: The study of microscopic organisms, such as bacteria, viruses, archaea, fungi and protozoa.

subjects.name: Pharmacology
subjects.description: The branch of medicine concerned with the uses, effects, and modes of action of drugs.

clinical-books.title: Goodman & Gilman's The Pharmacological Basis of Therapeutics
clinical-books.author: 13th Edition

subjects.name: Community Medicine
subjects.description: Focuses on the health of populations, aiming to prevent disease and promote health at the community level.

textbooks.title: Park's Textbook of Preventive and Social Medicine
textbooks.author: 25th Edition

subjects.name: Forensic Medicine
subjects.description: The application of medical knowledge to the investigation of crime, particularly in establishing the causes of injury or death.

textbooks.title: The Essentials of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology
textbooks.author: 34th Edition

subjects.name: ENT
subjects.description: The branch of medicine that specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of ear, nose, throat, and head & neck disorders.

textbooks.title: Dhingra's Diseases of Ear, Nose and Throat
textbooks.author: 7th Edition

subjects.name: Ophthalmology
subjects.description: The branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders and diseases of the eye.

textbooks.title: Comprehensive Ophthalmology by A. K. Khurana
textbooks.author: 7th Edition

subjects.name: General Medicine
subjects.description: The medical specialty dealing with the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of adult diseases.

textbooks.title: Davidson's Principles and Practice of Medicine
textbooks.author: 24th Edition

clinical-books.title: Alagappan Manual of Practical Medicine Book

subjects.name: General Surgery
subjects.description: A surgical specialty that focuses on abdominal contents, including the esophagus, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, liver, pancreas, gallbladder, appendix and bile ducts, and often the thyroid gland.

textbooks.title: Bailey & Love's Short Practice of Surgery
textbooks.author: 27th Edition

subjects.name: Obstetrics & Gynaecology
subjects.description: The medical specialty that encompasses the two subspecialties of obstetrics (covering pregnancy, childbirth, and the postpartum period) and gynaecology (covering the health of the female reproductive system).

subjects.name: Pediatrics
subjects.description: The branch of medicine that involves the medical care of infants, children, and adolescents.

subjects.name: Orthopedics
subjects.description: The branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.

subjects.name: Radiology
subjects.description: The medical discipline that uses medical imaging to diagnose and treat diseases within the bodies of animals and humans.

textbooks.title: Textbook of Radiology and Imaging by David Sutton
textbooks.author: 7th Edition

subjects.name: Anesthesiology
subjects.description: The medical specialty concerned with the total perioperative care of patients before, during and after surgery.

subjects.name: Psychiatry
subjects.description: The medical specialty devoted to the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of mental disorders.

subjects.name: Dermatology
subjects.description: The branch of medicine dealing with the skin, nails, hair and its diseases.
